title: El Smurfo LF Partner Silv/Gold to duo with all tonight.
body:
Only add me if you are actually good and consistent, and can play for a while tonight. Pref 18+ as im 18+.

Only a Gold smurf looking to get this account to gold, so don't get too hyped.

replies.body: hey man I'm down to duo with you for a couple of hours at least add me if you want...{{champion:150}}
